definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Turn right onto Ford Road and take the first street on your left.
sentences.chinese: 右转到福特路，然后第一条街左转。

sentences.english: My name is Evert , and I come from Holland.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字叫艾福特，来自荷兰。

sentences.english: This allegory program will show a direct tentacles extending toward China ordinary family sedan.
sentences.chinese: 这喻示着福特公司将触角直接伸向中国普通家庭轿车。

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 政制事务局2004年福特F150超级四轮驱动。

sentences.english: I like this quote from Henry Ford, right?
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢亨利，福特的一句话？

sentences.english: The Ford Mustang was originally based on the Ford Falcon compact.
sentences.chinese: 福特野马是基于福特猎鹰系列小型车而生产的。

sentences.english: The Ford Mustang was originally based on the Ford Falcon compact.
sentences.chinese: 福特野马是基于福特猎鹰系列小型车而生产的。

sentences.english: It tur out that you are Mr. Ford's son. No wonder you are the very image of him.
sentences.chinese: 原来你是福特先生的公子，怪不得长得那么象他。

sentences.english: But the idea of Beaufort gnawed him.
sentences.chinese: 不过一想到博福特，他又变得心烦意乱。

sentences.english: Henry ford envisaged an important future for the motorcar.
sentences.chinese: 亨利福特为汽车设想了光明的远景。

sentences.english: Ford (F, Fortune 500) is the 800-pound gorilla of the taxi business.
sentences.chinese: 福特可谓出租车行业的巨无霸。

sentences.english: At Ford, my official salary had been $360,000.
sentences.chinese: 在福特公司，我的正式薪资是三十六万美元。

sentences.english: “As a rule Ford adamantly refused to adopt parts and components patented by others, ” Greenleaf writes.
sentences.chinese: 作为规定，福特强烈反对接受他人零部件专利。

sentences.english: As far as she could judge, Mr. Crawford was considerably the best actor of all.
sentences.chinese: 就她看来，克劳福特先生在所有演员当中远居第一。

sentences.english: What are your feelings about the recent CFMA Employee Communication meeting?
sentences.chinese: 你对于今天的长安福特马自达沟通会议总体感受是？

sentences.english: President Bush, who escorted Mrs. Ford into the Cathedral, delivered the main eulogy.
sentences.chinese: 布什总统陪同福特夫人同往教堂并致悼词。

definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: Lincoln (name)/Abraham Lincoln (1809-1865), US president 1861-1865/Lincoln, US car make
Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
